name: GLKVertexAttrib
desc: Values used as indices in OpenGL code to associate vertex data with an attribute in a named shader effect.

items.name: case position
items.desc: This index is used to provide the vertex position to a shader.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: This index is used to provide the vertex normal to a shader.

items.name: case color
items.desc: This index is used to provide the vertex color to a shader.

items.name: case texCoord0
items.desc: This index is used to provide a set of texture coordinates to a shader.

items.name: case texCoord1
items.desc: This index is used to provide the second set of texture coordinates to a shader.
